articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: PCB invites BCCI secretary Jay Shah to Pakistan to watch Asia Cup opening match - Hindustan Times
articles.description: PCB revealed that besides Shah, heads of other cricketing bodies of the ACC have also been invited for the match. | Cricket
articles.content: The 2023 edition of the Asia Cup will kick off from August 30 onwards in Pakistan. Owing to Indian government's stance amid the political tension between the two neighbouring nations, BCCI and PCB ag… [+2230 chars]
